review: It sometimes stop working or the picture becomes really small and goes into the right upper corner of the tv screen and we need to unplug it and start over.  We've had it since Christmas and that's happened like 5 times now and just yesterday it happened twice in the span of an hour.

review: It has trouble staying connected to my wireless router.  I can stream Amazon Prime from my computer sitting right next to the Amazon Fire Stick and it works perfectly, but if I try streaming from the Fire Stick, it buffers every 30 seconds and the picture is extremely grainy.  Would not purchase again unless Amazon fixed the wireless signal and the picture quality.
